summary: This is an email chain from August 2020 arranging an interview with a witness. The witness was allegedly introduced to a person (name redacted) by Ghislaine Maxwell when the person was 18. The email also notes that Michael Garland, mentioned in FBI 302 reports, has passed away and resided in the UK when Maxwell reportedly met the person at age 17.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as the person who allegedly set up the witness with another individual when that individual was 18.

persons.name: Michael Garland
persons.context: Noted as having passed away; he resided in the UK at the time Maxwell allegedly met a person at age 17.

connections.description: Email discusses arranging an interview with a witness connected to Maxwell's alleged activities.
Garland is mentioned in the context of Maxwell's alleged meeting with a person at age 17, while he resided in the UK.

events.title: Scheduled witness interview
events.description: An interview is being scheduled for Wednesday afternoon (August 26, 2020) with a witness who was allegedly introduced to someone by Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A witness was allegedly set up with an individual by Ghislaine Maxwell when that individual was 18 years old.
Michael Garland, mentioned in FBI 302 reports, is noted as deceased and was residing in the UK at a relevant time.
The email chain is coordinating an interview for an ongoing investigation, likely related to child exploitation or human trafficking.
The correspondence involves a Detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.
Key names of correspondents and the witness appear to be redacted in the provided text.
